name: Rolling Quest
description:
Small platform game made under Unreal Engine when discovering the program.

Features:
-The game contains 3 levels
-Takes less than 30 to complete
-The game saves your progress between levels
-There's easy mode if you're having too much trouble. :)

Control:
-Either Arrow keys + Space bar
-Either ZQSD (yes, the frenchy keyboard ^^ )
-Either a controller

The game is only on Windows, I can probably adapt it for other media, just ask if you want it somewhere else.

I hope you'll enjoy playing it and don't hesitate to leave a comment about what you thought about it, bugs, suggestions, etc...

WR Any% by RysinGan in 2:58

You can send your speedrun by sharing a screenshot :D
